EventTriggerConfiguration
struct
EventTriggerConfiguration
Types
Type

Type of trigger to configure

NONE

0x00 - No trigger selected. The state will always be inactive

GPIO_TRIGGER

0x01 - Trigger based on the state of a GPIO pin

THRESHOLD_TRIGGER

0x02 - Compare a data quantity against a high and low threshold

COMBINATION_TRIGGER

0x03 - Logical combination of two or more triggers

Variables
instance
uint8 instance

Trigger number

trigger
Type trigger

Type of trigger

parameters
EventTriggerParameters parameters

Trigger parameters
